model_answer: The video cuts to a close-up of the seasoning bottles when the host is discussing the high cost of groceries in Barbados and the expense of US brands compared to local brands. The purpose of showing the bottles is likely to emphasize the importance of buying local products as a way to save money. Therefore, the correct answer would be option A.
The segment discussing clothing costs is from 00:07:07 to 00:07:53.
